text: Frýdlant (-Czech, German: Friedland) is a town in the Czech Republic. About 7,600 people live there. It is located in the north of the historical region Bohemia. Image:Frydlant Rathaus.JPG|Town hall of Frýdlant Image:Frydlant BurgSchloss.JPG|Castle Frýdlant ==References== Category:Cities in the Czech Republic Category:Liberec Region
